text: Please can you guys make customers have faith in your services. My fianc√©e had paid to use your service and we end up in a very critical situation. It has brought us sleepless night . Last week 1/12/2023 my fianc√©e sent me a waybill containing DSLR CAMERA üì∑ and till the moment the india custom department had being requesting for commercial invoice, I have sent every document they requested of me but up till this minute they are still requesting for the commercial invoice because the invoice your office issued to my fianc√©e was rejected 8 times I uploaded it to the link and email sent to me by the india DHL New Delhi branch . I consider this as a poor service. I urge and Please your team to look into this issue as soon as possible.

I informed the staff over the phone that my shipment is abt 2kg. She then said that she will provide me a box that would fit my item well and can hold up to 4kg. Subsequently when I called to schedule a pickup, I was told that I would have to pay a $328 for 4kg even though the items in the box is worth only $120 and no more than 2kg. The customer service officer insist that I should pay for 4kg just because the box could carry that weight regardless of how heavy the items i have placed inside weigh. I am trying to figure out how reasonable this is.

Can never know when the parcel will arrive. They cannot state a timing and have to deliver 3 times before I can receive the parcel. First time trying to deliver at about 10pm on a Friday night!2nd time trying to deliver at 6.22pm on a Saturday, expecting me to wait whole day for them. Waybill ref not working and no way to tell them alternative way to send.
Another  Disastrous experience. Without doubt this is the very worst DHL in this region and another failed pick up delivery. How can they consistently get it so wrong.
need improvement for the escalator and service so slow
